::Zardus/Prowl/Striker/DeathStorm/Zeus/Mosquitor::

Zardus looks at the screen showing the CR chambers. He looks over at the 
scanner showing the three predacons and back at the visual. If it came to a 
fight, Nemesis and DeathStorm would be outnumbered two to three.

"Dark One," he says into his comm-link, "After you are repaired, please go to 
Nemesis' position in case he needs backup."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl smiles. "I'm glad you aproove, my lady," he says mockingly and then 
looks down at the unconcious predacon at his feet.

"Lat's get him back to base," he says and picks Zenyak up over his shoulder, 
taking the pred's gun in the proccess.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker looks at Zyber. "Me and the predacon seem to ... disagree on several 
topics. I think my presence is getting him quite mad. I'll make it back to my 
base, don't worry. Thank you for saving my life." With that, he walks off 
toward where his scanners have last identified the maximal base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathStorm nods. "Assassinate is what I do."

He transforms into beast mode and flies off after Nemesis.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Mosquitor runs out into the charred are of the forest where Set and Ra are. 
Opening fire, he is hit in the back by a bolt from Zeus.

He trips over Set's fallen form and flies into a tree. He gets up and flies 
off trying to find Hell Beast.

Zeus stops in the middle of the clearing and looks at Ra. "You two all 
right?" He asked, not noticing Ares.
